main_text.tagline: Contributing to valuable healthcare and display industries
main_text.title: UniQDot Inc.

items.title: Effective
items.description: Without using toxic heavy metal cadmium, it emits light on its own and has high efficiency by utilizing indium phosphide or similar materials.

items.title: Stable
items.description: Bio quantum dots with brightness 10 ~ 100 times higher and better biocompatibility than conventional fluorescent materials.

items.title: Technical
items.description: Combining quantum dot-based light-emitting diode (QLED) technology and quantum dot nano-ink fabrication technology with organic light-emitting diode (OLED) technology.

ceo_message.title: CEO Message
content:
UniQDot Inc. is a leading company in display and in vitro diagnostics fields
based on advanced Quantum Dot technology. Using eco-friendly InP Quantum Dots,
we provide clearer and more stable display technology.
while setting new standards in in vitro diagnostics through Bio Quantum Dot technology.

In particular, our in vitro diagnostic solutions applying Quantum Dot Surface Engineering
technology are being developed in collaboration with leading healthcare companies worldwide.

aiming to provide more precise and reliable diagnostic technologies that benefit
both medical professionals and patients.

UniQDot Inc. prioritizes value creation through technological innovation, and through
continuous research, development, and collaboration, we will open new possibilities
in the display industry and healthcare field.
We will continue to move forward and contribute to improving human health and quality of life.

company_overview.title: Company Overview
description: UniQDot Inc. researches and develops various Quantum Dot technologies, leading the advanced nanomaterial field.
We drive innovation in display, biodiagnostics, and energy industries through eco-friendly high-performance materials, including cadmium and cadmium-free solutions like InP, ZnSe, CuInS, AgInGaS.

quantumDots.title: Quantum Dots
quantumDots.description: Quantum dots (QDs) are fluorescent semiconductor nanocrystals with unique optical and electronic properties.
features: Simultaneous multicolor emission from a single light source
quantumDots.conclusion: Due to these distinctive features, QDs have emerged as a unique type of luminescent nanoparticle with promising potential in optoelectronics, biotechnology, and pharmaceuticals.

intro.title: Intro.
intro.description: We offer a complete line of core/shell QD products in solid form, available in either organic solvents or aqueous solutions.

coreTechnologies.title: Development and applications of eco-friendly quantum dot materials: QDs for devices and biomedical use

items.summary: Development of a novel synthesis method for indium phosphide (InP) quantum dots — a less toxic alternative to conventional cadmium-containing CdSe QDs — with enhanced brightness and high color purity.
details: • This material is hydrophobic and is currently supplied as display quantum dots to S Company and various research institutes.

items.summary: By synthesizing bio-quantum dots through surface modification, they can be utilized as versatile materials for bio-imaging and diagnostic kits.
details: • We provide bio-quantum dots with dispersion stability for several months in distilled water, PBS buffer solutions, and serum, featuring high quantum yields (>50%) across the 400 ~ 665 nm emission range.
• These high-quality quantum dots are promising alternatives to conventional organic dyes and other fluorophores, and we are currently developing them for supply to the diagnostic kit market.
